department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply and installation of new power for the berthing of Geliget at North Head Wharf.
description: Furnish all plant, labour, equipment and material required to perform the work of installation of a new electrical power for the vessel at the wharf.
tags: State, Municipal, or Local Government-Elgibility applies to all domestic bidders who have an authorized trade agreement with Governments of Canada.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**[English]**
Project Title: ITT - EC373-240520 - North Head Geliget Berthing Power

**[French]**
Titre Projet: IÀS – EC373-240520 – Branchement électrique d'accostage de North Head Geliget

**Reference Number:** WS4263792340-Doc4290609970

**Publication Date:** November 3, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** November 28, 2023, 14:00 hrs (Eastern Time)

**Procurement Category:** CNST
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:** None
**Regions of Delivery:** New Brunswick

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has a requirement for the supply and installation of new power for the berthing of the Geliget vessel at the North Head Wharf in Grand Manan, New Brunswick. 

The following information can be obtained from the [notification website](link_to_notification_website) and [supplier registration](link_to_supplier_registration):

A list of suppliers who are prequalified and certified for this project can be found on the PSPC procurement system. In order to receive opportunities and notifications from PSPC, suppliers should register themselves on the PSDC-Supplier Registration database.

Please visit the PSPC's website at [www.typo_gc.ca](http://www.typo_gc.ca) to review and download all solicitation documents related to this project.

You can also get in touch with the contact person below if you need clarification on this project.

**Contact Information**

Name: Timothee Beausoleil2
Email: timothee.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Phone: 
Fax: 
Address: None

This project is closed. Please do not submit your bid.
-----

Note that I assumed that the notification website, supplier registration, and the PSPC's website are links to actual websites. Also, I did not paste the entire raw data from the contractor. Only relevant information was included. Let me know if you need anything else!
